GSP33yamis_pu:0: tatra kasyacid ekasya vaśe viśvaṃ pravartate /
GSP33yamis_pu:1: iti sādhayituṃ pūrvaṃ pūrvapakṣaṃ pracakṣmahe // YIs_1 //
GSP33yamis_pu:2: tatra mīmāṃsakāḥ prāhuḥ nāyaṃ sarvārthadarśanaśaktisampannaḥ puruṣo 'bhyupagamam arhati,
GSP33yamis_pu:4: tathā hi asya pratyakṣam anyad vā sādhakaṃ bhavet ?
GSP33yamis_pu:8: sarvārthadarśanaśaktiśālinam avagamayatā hi deśakālasvabhāvaviprakarṣavyavadhānajuṣaḥ sarva evārthās darśanaṃ śaktiś ca gocarayitavyāni /
GSP33yamis_pu:9: na ca vidyamānendriyasannikarṣayogyakatipayaviṣayaniyatavṛtter laukikapratyakṣasya niravadhir ayaṃ mahimā saṃbhāvanābhūmir iti katham iva tad iha sādhanam iti manyemahi /
GSP33yamis_pu:13: tat khalu yogivijñānam aindriyakaṃ na vā ?
GSP33yamis_pu:15: bahirindriyāṇi tāvat samadhigatanijaviṣayasannikarṣasahakārīṇi tadgocarajñānajananānīti jagati viditam /
GSP33yamis_pu:24: arthasannikarṣasahakārīṇi bahirindriyāṇi jñānajananānīti tāny api nātīte 'nāgate vārthe jñānaṃ janayantīti na tad upajanitaṃ pratyakṣaṃ yathoktaviṣayaniyamam atikrāmati /
GSP33yamis_pu:27: bāhyaviṣayamitiṣu ca manaso niraṅkuśakaraṇatāṅgīkāre hi kṛtaṃ cakṣurādibhiḥ /
GSP33yamis_pu:28: ataś ca kaścid andho badhiro vā bhavet /
GSP33yamis_pu:29: bhavati cātra vimatipadaṃ mano bahirindriyanirapekṣaṃ na bāhyapratyakṣagocare pravartate,
GSP33yamis_pu:31: yady atra yattantravṛtti na tat tannirapekṣaṃ tatra pravartate,
GSP33yamis_pu:33: na ca siddhāuṣadhamantratapaḥsamādhimahimasamāsāditātiśayānīndriyāṇi kadācid apajahati samadhigataviṣayaniyamam iti sambhavati;
GSP33yamis_pu:36: na khalu suprayuktabheṣajaśatavihitasaṃskāram api śrotraṃ rūparasavibhāvāvagamāya kalpate /
GSP33yamis_pu:39: dṛśyamānatatprakarṣavad ity aindriyakaṃ jñānaṃ nātītādi gocarayati /
GSP33yamis_pu:40_0: bhāvanāprakarṣaparyantajanmanas tu saty api viśadanirbhāsatve prācyānubhavagocarād
GSP33yamis_pu:42: pratyakṣasya vā sataḥ katham iva viditaviṣayaniyamavyatikramaḥ ?
GSP33yamis_pu:43: atikrāmato vā kutaḥ pratyakṣatvam iti na viśvānubhavāiśvaryaśālini pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇam /
GSP33yamis_pu:46: anumānam api viśeṣato dṛṣṭaṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭaṃ vā ?
GSP33yamis_pu:47: tatra sakalapadavīdavīyasi bhavati na tāvat svalakṣaṇasākṣātkārapūrvakāvinābhāvāvadhāraṇādhīnodayatvād idam anumānam udetum alam /
GSP33yamis_pu:48: na hy anavagatacarahutabhujas tadavinābhāvitayā dhūmam anusandhātum īśate /
GSP33yamis_pu:49: na ca sarvārthanirmāṇasākṣātkārapaṭīyasi liṅgaṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭam api kiñcana labhate /
GSP33yamis_pu:53: kāryatvād eva jagatas tatkartur anumīyatām // YIs_5 //
GSP33yamis_pu:55: kāryaṃ ca vimatipadam avanigirimahārṇavādīti tad api tathāvidhabuddhimaddhetukam adhyavasīyate /
GSP33yamis_pu:56: na ca kāryatvam asiddham iti vācyam,
GSP33yamis_pu:58: iha cānyāvayavibhyaḥ prabhṛti ādvyaṇukam akhilam avayavi kramanihīyamānanānāvayavavyatiṣaṅgaviśeṣajanitam avagatam ity antata upādānaṃ caturvidhāḥ paramāṇavaḥ prapañcasya /
GSP33yamis_pu:59: teṣām ādiparispandasya tadanuguṇādṛṣṭaviśiṣṭatattatkṣetrajñasaṃyogāsamavāyikāraṇaka iti upakaraṇam api samastakṣetrajñavartini dharmādharmalakṣaṇāny adṛṣṭāni /
GSP33yamis_pu:62_0: na cāmī svasamavāyināv api dharmādharmāvalam avalokayitum iti tadatirekī nikhilabhuvananirmāṇanipuṇo
GSP33yamis_pu:62_2: puruṣadhaureyakaḥ kim iti na sāmānyatodṛṣṭaliṅgād anumīyate ?
GSP33yamis_pu:63: tad idam aviditānumānavṛttasya svamatiracitataralatarkollasitam iti parihasanti mīmāṃsakāḥ /
GSP33yamis_pu:64: tathā hi kim idam ekacetanādhīnatvaṃ nāmābhipretaṃ tanubhuvanādeḥ ? /
GSP33yamis_pu:66: kim asya tasminn āyattaṃ kiṃ nu janmātha vā sthitiḥ /
GSP33yamis_pu:67: pravṛttir vādyayos tāvat sādhyahīnaṃ nidarśanam // YIs_6 //
GSP33yamis_pu:70: bhavati hi taducitādṛṣṭaśālināṃ sarveṣām eva teṣāṃ taddehina iva tadutpattisthitinimittatvam /
GSP33yamis_pu:71: api ca śarīrāvayavinaḥ svāvayavasamavāyalakṣaṇā sthitir avayavyatiṣaṅgaviśeṣād ṛte na cetayitāraṃ param apekṣate /
GSP33yamis_pu:73: na sā pakṣīkṛte kṣityādau sambhavatīti sthitim api naikarūpāṃ pakṣasapakṣānuyāyinīm udīkṣāmahe /
GSP33yamis_pu:77: cetanair bhoktṛbhir bhogyaḥ karmabhir janyate hi naḥ // YIs_7 //
GSP33yamis_pu:78: yuktaṃ caitat yadubhayavādisiddhānām eva cetanānāṃ kartṛtvābhyupagamaḥ; lāghavāt /
GSP33yamis_pu:81: sākṣātkartuṃ kṣamante yat sarva eva ca cetanāḥ // YIs_8 //
GSP33yamis_pu:82: adyavad eva viśvambharādayaḥ kramaprāptāgantukopacayāpacayaikadeśaśālino na yugapad eva niravaśeṣavilayajananabhāgina ityantimaparamāṇusākṣātkāro na kartṛbhāvopayogī /
GSP33yamis_pu:84: mā bhūt pratyakṣatā tasya śaktimad dhy akṣagocaraḥ // YIs_9 //
GSP33yamis_pu:85: na khalu kulālādayaḥ kumbhādikāryam ārabhamāṇās tadupādānopakaraṇabhūtamṛddaṇḍacakrādikāryotpādanaśaktiṃ sākṣātkṛtya tat tad ārabhante /
GSP33yamis_pu:86: yadi paraṃ śaktim aviduṣām abhilaṣitasādhane tadupādānādivyavahāro 'nupapannaḥ, iha tu
GSP33yamis_pu:88: tena karmabhir ātmānaḥ sarvaṃ nirmimatāṃ pṛthak // YIs_10 //
GSP33yamis_pu:89: api ca tad eva cetanakarṭrkaṃ jagati paridṛśyate,
GSP33yamis_pu:91: na ca tathā mahīmahīśvaramahārṇavādīti katham iva tattatkāryatvam ?
GSP33yamis_pu:93: yādṛśaṃ hi kāryam upādānādyabhijñapūrvakam avagataṃ ghaṭamaṇikādi,
GSP33yamis_pu:95_0: api cānīśvareṇa parimitaśaktijñānena vigrahavatānavāptakāmena kṛtam avagataṃ ghaṭādikāryam
GSP33yamis_pu:95_1: iti tathāvidhaṃ boddhāram upasthāpayan hetur abhimatapuruṣasārvajñyasarvāiśvaryādiviparyayasādhanādiviruddhaḥ syāt /
GSP33yamis_pu:97: pramāṇāntaragocare hi liṅgini liṅgabalād āpatato viparītaviśeṣāṃs tatpramāṇam eva pratiruṇaddhi /
GSP33yamis_pu:98: iha punar atipatitasakalamānāntarakarmabhāve sarvanirmāṇanipuṇe siṣādhayiṣite yāvanto 'nvayavyatirekāvadhāritāvinābhāvabhājo dharmās tān apy aviśeṣeṇopasthāpayati /
GSP33yamis_pu:106: na copādānādisākṣātkāriṇi eva kartṛtvam ity api niyamaḥ;
GSP33yamis_pu:107: upādānam upakaraṇaṃ cāviduṣa evātmano jñānādiṣu kartṛtvāt /
GSP33yamis_pu:111: prayogaś ca bhavati mahīmahīdharādi kāryaṃ na bhavati,
GSP33yamis_pu:119: tanubhuvanādīśvarakartṛkaṃ na bhavati kāryatvāt tadvad eva /
GSP33yamis_pu:120: īśvaraḥ kartā na bhavati prayojanarahitatvād aśarīratvād vā muktātmavad iti /
GSP33yamis_pu:121: atra brūmo na kāryatvaṃ kṣityādau śakyanihnavam /
GSP33yamis_pu:127: yat tu śakyakriyaṃ śakyajñānopādānopakaraṇaṃ ca kriyata iti,
GSP33yamis_pu:129: kin tu te kriyājñānaśaktī kriyājñānābhyām eva samadhigamanīye /
GSP33yamis_pu:130: te ca kṣityādiṣu yathoktasādhanabalasamupasthāpite iti na viśeṣaḥ prasiddhaprākāragopurādikāryebhyas tanubhuvanādeḥ /
GSP33yamis_pu:131: na caitāvān eva kriyāgocara iti viṣayaniyamaḥ kaścit kriyāyā dṛṣṭaḥ;
GSP33yamis_pu:133: siddhe ca kāryatve tadupādānādisakṣātkaraṇatadadhiṣṭhānatatpreraṇanipuṇaḥ puruṣaviśeṣaḥ sidhyaty eva /
GSP33yamis_pu:142: na hi cetanena vardhakinānadhiṣṭhitā vāsī deśakālādisahakāriśatasamadhigame 'pi yūpādīny upādayitum alam /
GSP33yamis_pu:143: bījāṅkurādayas tu pakṣāntarbhūtā iti tair vyabhicāravacanam anabhijñatayaiva śrotriyāṇām /
GSP33yamis_pu:156: na hi kiñcit kriyamāṇaṃ kartur arthāntaraviṣayam asāmarthyam ajñānaṃ vā svotpattaye 'pekṣate;
GSP33yamis_pu:159: api ca kiṃ taditarasamastavastuviṣayam ajñānādi vyāpakam,
GSP33yamis_pu:163: na khalu kumbhakāraḥ kumbhātireki kim api na vijānāti /
GSP33yamis_pu:165: tad api na, aniyataviṣayatayā tasya tasya vyabhicāradarśanāt /
GSP33yamis_pu:170: na khalu śarīraviśiṣṭas sann evāyam ātmā śarīram upādatte,
GSP33yamis_pu:172: pūrvadehaparityāgena dehāntaraprāpakakarmapreritaprāṇasahāya eva dehāntaraṃ praviśatīty upapāditam ātmacintāyām /
GSP33yamis_pu:176: adhitiṣṭhāsitadehasaṃyogavata eva tatpravṛttyanuguṇaprayatnayogalakṣaṇam adhiṣṭhānaṃ dṛṣṭam iti cet;
GSP33yamis_pu:179: na yato 'nyad apy adhiṣṭhīyamānaṃ mānadaṇḍādi svasambandhinaivādhiṣṭhīyate /
GSP33yamis_pu:181: asti ceśvarasyāpi jagadupādānopakaraṇais sambandha ity uktam eva /
GSP33yamis_pu:183: dṛṣṭaṃ hi daṇḍacakrādiṣu karasaṃyogādinā kulālādeḥ pravartayitṛtvam ity ucyeta;
GSP33yamis_pu:187: katham asati śarīre parapreraṇātmakaḥ saṅkalpa iti cet;
GSP33yamis_pu:196: manaso nityendriyatayā dehāpagame 'pi sambandhābhyupagamād anaikāntikaś ca /
GSP33yamis_pu:199_1: prādeśikaśarīrakaḥ kiñcijjñaḥ puṇyapāpaparavaśagatir alaṃ nirmāṇāyety aparimitajñānāiśvaryaśaktiḥ
GSP33yamis_pu:199_2: śarīrādyanapekṣaḥ saṅkalpād eva sakalabhuvananirmāṇakṣamaḥ kartā siddhaḥ /
GSP33yamis_pu:200: īdṛśena kartrā ghaṭādiṣu kāryatvasya sambandho na dṛṣṭa iti cet;
GSP33yamis_pu:201: atigahanagiritaṭādhiṣṭhānenātiprakṛṣṭādṛṣṭacarendhananivahasambandhinā hutavahaviśeṣeṇa mahānasādau dhūmasya vā kiṃ sambandho dṛṣṭaḥ ?
GSP33yamis_pu:203: yādṛśo dhūmo yatrāvagataḥ tatraiva tādṛśas tatsampādanasamartho dṛṣtāntabhūmāv aparidṛṣṭo 'pi sāmānyavyāptibalena pakṣadharmatāvaśāt sidhyatīti cet;
GSP33yamis_pu:204: tad idam asmābhir abhidhīyamānaṃ kim iti na hṛdayam adhirohati bhavatām /
GSP33yamis_pu:205: ihāpi kāryatvaṃ samarthakartṛpūrvakatvena ghaṭādiṣu viditasambandhaniyamaṃ kṣtityādiṣu dṛśyamānaṃ svasampādanasamartham adṛṣṭapūrvam eva buddhimatkartāram upasthāpayati /
GSP33yamis_pu:206: yathaiva hi deśakālendhanaparimāṇādiviśeṣānādareṇa dhūmasya svodayānuguṇahutavahamātreṇa sambandhaniyamaḥ,
GSP33yamis_pu:207_1: kāryasya svanirmāṇasamarthabuddhimatkartṛmātreṇa sambandhaniyamaniścaya iti na kaścidviśeṣaḥ /
GSP33yamis_pu:208: api ca vibhudravyasaṃyoginaḥ parispandavataś ca sarvatra sparśavattvāvyabhicāre 'pi jñānasukhādinityadravyaviśeṣaguṇānumitātmasaṃyogino manasaḥ katham iva sparśarahitatatvam ?
GSP33yamis_pu:209: kathaṃ ca vāyavīyadravyasya mahimaguṇaśālino niyatādhiṣṭhānasparśanatvaniyamadarśane 'pi tvagindriye tadviparyayaḥ ?
GSP33yamis_pu:210: taijasasya vā rūpasparśayor anyattarasya vā prākaṭyaniyame 'pi rūpopalambhasādhanatānumitataijasabhāvasya cakṣuṣo niyamena tadubhayānudbhavābhyupagamaḥ ? /
GSP33yamis_pu:211: atha kāryadarśanānumitasadbhāvānāṃ taijasādibhāve 'pi tattadviśeṣaṇāṃ yogyānupalabdhibādhitatvāt tadabhyupagame 'nekaniyamabhaṅgaprasaṅgāc ca tathābhyupagamaḥ,
GSP33yamis_pu:212: hanta tarhi prakṛtaviṣaye 'pi prasañjitadharmaviśeṣāṇām anupalambhabādhāviśeṣād anekaniyamadarśanavighātaprasaṅgāc ca tathābhyupagama iti sarvaṃ samānam anyatrābhiniveśāt /
GSP33yamis_pu:218: tathā vivādādhyāsitā bāhyābhyantarapravṛttayaḥ prakṛtyupakaraṇapratyakṣapūrvikāḥ kāryatvāt tadvad eva /
